Title: Japan’s LNG stocks edge higher in mid-May
Description: LNG stocks held by Japan’s power utilities edged higher for the second consecutive month, with mid-May levels staying above the 2 mn mt level.
Author: CK

Title: India’s GSPC, IOC issue tenders to buy July LNG cargoes
Description: India’s state-owned energy firm Gujarat State Petroleum Corp.(GSPC) is seeking one cargo for delivery across Jul. 16 to 30 to the 5 mtpa Mundra LNG receiving terminal in Gujarat, while fellow state-owned oil firm Indian Oil (IOC) is seeking a cargo to be delivered on July 2 to the 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminals. The tenders close tomorrow.
Author: CK
